resources.string: NOTE: Kannada Language Exam is only for Horanadu and Gadinadu Kannadiga Candidates (Clauses c and d).\nMinimum Passing Marks are 12 out of 50.
NOTE: Practical Exam is only applicable to candidates who are eligible to claim the Agriculturist Quota.\nMinimum passing marks are 100 out of 200(50%).
